about: Jes√∫s Lastra aka Voidborn Horde, is a Venezuelan ambient electronic music composer born in 1986. Since 2002, He starts this musical journey by exploring experimental sounds, influenced by ambient music and soundscapes that evoke vast and ethereal imaginary worlds. Under the alias Voidborn Horde, he has developed an unique style with electronic elements and ambient textures, finding a kind of "false enviroment sounds" to give the listener an immersive and dreamlike experience. His music is characterized by its ability to evoke neutral deep emotions and meditative states of patience, making him a reference in the ambient music scene. _________________________ I'm just a software tester. If I like the software I buy it. If I don't have how to acquire it, I don't waste my time and upload the samples here. I can also recommend Arturia Instruments or Native Instruments.(Hardware/Software). If you can't buy it either, I suggest the following Google search. FREE VST AND PLUGINS or BEST FREE D.A.W. _________________________ Software - FL Studio - Audacity - Virtual Instruments - Cubase LE AI Elements 6 - Adobe Photoshop CS2 - WaveEditor Record & Edit Audio (Sound-Base Audio, LLC) Hardware - Vieta Pro Way 4 - MSI GF63 Thin 11UC - Interface Scarlett 2i2 - Condenser Microphone(CM25) - Audio-Technica ATH-M50X - Arturia MiniLab - USB/MIDI Controller - Nikon D3200 - M-Audio Axiom 61 - M-Audio Oxygen 61 - M-Audio Hammer 88 - M-Audio BX5 D3 (Studio Monitors) - JVC HA-RX330-E Headphone - AKG Headphone - SONY SRS-D25 - Samsung S10 Edge - Xiaomi Redmi 9C - Xiaomi Redmi 14C ________________________ There is geometry in the humming of the strings. There is music in the spacing of the spheres. ~Pythagoras _______________________ Donations: https://freesound.org/donations/donate/ Note: donations are managed through the Phonos Foundation, an institution linked to the Music Technology Group for the promotion of social and cultural initiatives. Currently, we only accept donations via PayPal and international credit cards.
